translation.en: Fuck yes.
You need a towel, miss.
I need a drink, Brian, but I'd settle for a towel, thank you.
translation.it: Mi serve un drink, Brian, ma vada per l'asciugamano, grazie.

translation.en: That closet is magic.
Oh, it's just the basics really, miss.
When the apocalypse comes, I hope I'm with you.
translation.it: Se arriva l'apocalisse, spero tu ci sia.

translation.en: -It would be my pleasure. -[woman chuckles]
Glad to hear luck went your way in the Butler trial.
translation.it: Sono lieto che abbia avuto fortuna al processo Butler.

translation.en: -What do you mean "luck"? -[Brian chuckles]
I don't know how you do it, miss.
[woman] Anything decent come in?
There is something in your pigeonhole. Next-level stuff, I'd say.
translation.it: C'è qualcosa nel suo casellario. Di un livello superiore, direi.

translation.en: Intriguing. I'll take a look.
Shall I wait?
No. You should go.
Are you sure there's nothing I can do?
translation.it: È certa che non possa far niente?

translation.en: Yes, there is, Brian.
Have a glorious weekend.
There you go, madam.
-[waitress] Champagne? -Thank you.
-[woman] Hi, Sophie. -Hello, darling. Hi.
-[woman 2] Mrs Whitehouse. How are you? -Oh hello.
translation.it: - Sig.ra Whitehouse. Va tutto bene? - Salve.

translation.en: -What could be bad on this beautiful day? -[woman 2 chuckles]
translation.it: Cosa può non andare in questa bella giornata?

translation.en: [woman 3] Hello.
-[woman 4] There she is. -Hello, hello.
-Where's your handsome half? -That is a very good question.
translation.it: - Dov'è la tua bella metà? - È un'ottima domanda.

translation.en: He promised he would leave the constituency on time for once, but…
translation.it: Ha promesso di lasciare il collegio elettorale prima, ma…

translation.en: -How's the birthday boy? -In denial.
translation.it: - Come sta il festeggiato? - Non lo accetta.

translation.en: -[man] Thank you. -[woman 5] Enjoy your night.
-[Sophie] Hello. -I don't like the number 44.
translation.it: - Ciao. - Non mi piace il numero 44.

translation.en: Oh, but 44 is the luckiest number in ancient Egypt.
translation.it: È il numero più fortunato nell'antico Egitto.

translation.en: -Highly associated with wealth and wisdom. -Is that true?
translation.it: - Associato a ricchezza e saggezza. - È vero?

translation.en: No. I just made it up. [chuckles]
-Cheeky Sophie. -[man 2] Happy birthday.
You have half your whole life ahead of you.
translation.it: Hai tutta la vita davanti a te.

translation.en: We are lucky.
-Where's James? -Let me find out.
-Happy birthday, Mark. -Excuse me. Sorry.
-[Ellie] Lucy. -[Lucy] Ellie, darling.
-[Lucy] Hello. -You've reached James Whitehouse.
Please leave your name and number. I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
translation.it: Lasciate nome e numero e sarete richiamati.

translation.en: My darling man, where the fuck are you?
[woman] I counted.
I stood on the kerb, and I counted.
translation.it: Ero sul marciapiede e ho contato.

translation.en: And the little green man flashed for a mere five seconds.
translation.it: E l'omino verde ha lampeggiato per soli cinque secondi.

translation.en: -Well, that's not enough time, is it? -No, it's not, Minister.
translation.it: - Non è abbastanza, vero? - No, Ministro.

translation.en: I mean, I think they decided that pedestrian crossings only needed a second per metre.
translation.it: Avranno calcolato un secondo al metro per attraversare le strisce pedonali.

translation.en: Now, I know that you do have more important things to consider,
translation.it: So che ha cose più importanti di cui occuparsi,

translation.en: but show me an old bird who could manage that.
translation.it: ma mi mostri una vecchia bacucca che ci riesca.

translation.en: First of all, show me an old bird, Mrs Murray.
translation.it: Prima mi mostri una vecchia bacucca.

translation.en: And I take the safety of my constituents personally.
translation.it: La sicurezza dei miei elettori è sacra.

translation.en: What I want for my family is what I want for Mrs Sibyl Murray of Thurlsdon.
translation.it: La sig.ra Murray di Thurlsdon è come la mia famiglia.

translation.en: We'll write a letter.
-Right away. -Thank you very much indeed.
-[James] Got everything? Okay. -[woman] Yes, sir.
[James] Straight home, please.
-[driver] Sure. -Thank you.
-Would you go back? -[Sophie] To Corsica? In a heartbeat.
It was the most relaxing holiday of my life.
translation.it: La vacanza più rilassante della mia vita.

translation.en: James taught the kids how to sail, and I sat on the beach and remembered that I knew how to read.
translation.it: James faceva vela coi bambini e io ho potuto leggere in spiaggia.

translation.en: -Four novels. Heaven. -[cell phone chimes]
Oh. Speak of the devil.
[man] I'd be happy to die in Corsica, as a matter of fact.
translation.it: - Sarei felice di morire in Corsica. - A me è mancato poco.

translation.en: [Lucy] I nearly did die in Corsica.
translation.it: - Sarei felice di morire in Corsica. - A me è mancato poco. È SUCCESSA UNA COSA. VEDIAMOCI A CASA.

translation.en: I didn't know about this thing called anaphylactic shock.
translation.it: È SUCCESSA UNA COSA. VEDIAMOCI A CASA. Shock anafilattico.

translation.en: Yes, it was before I knew about my shellfish allergy.
translation.it: Non sapevo della mia allergia ai crostacei.

translation.en: Three bites of shrimp. My face…
[whispers] Sorry. I have to go.
…it blew up like a balloon. It was absolutely… It was just enormous.
translation.it: Sembrava un palloncino insanguinato. Era enorme.

translation.en: -My throat closed off, I got sick… -Sophie?
translation.it: - Mi si è chiusa la gola… - Sophie.

translation.en: What's going on?
James can't make it. There's been some sort of emergency, which usually means a debate about noise pollution, but…
translation.it: James non viene. Ha un'emergenza. Si tratterà di inquinamento acustico, ma…

translation.en: Is everything okay?
Absolutely. Yes.
-Well, then you should stay. -[Sophie] I can't. I heard from Krystyna.
translation.it: - Allora resta. - No, ha chiamato Krystyna.

translation.en: She's not feeling well, so I have to take over with the kids.
translation.it: Non sta bene e devo occuparmi dei bambini.

translation.en: This was so lovely. Thank you.
That was rather embarrassing.
I invented three separate excuses in less than 30 seconds on your behalf.
translation.it: Ho inventato tre scuse in meno di 30 secondi per conto tuo.

translation.en: You owe me.
I've fucked up, big time.
Does she have a last name?
You've probably met her. She's one of my aides.
translation.it: L'avrai conosciuta. È una mia assistente.

translation.en: -Administrative? -Parliamentary researcher.
So she's new?
Relatively.
And young?
It had been going on for about five months.
I broke it off two weeks ago, right after the party conference.
translation.it: Ho chiuso due settimane fa, subito dopo il congresso.

translation.en: It meant nothing.
I was flattered.
It was just sex.
Not that there's ever been anything wrong with that part of us. You know that.
translation.it: Non che ci siano mai stati problemi in tal senso tra noi. Lo sai.

translation.en: I'm so sorry, Soph.
There's more.
You're not telling me just to tell me
translation.it: Me lo stai dicendo per un motivo.

translation.en: to unburden yourself.
There's more.
-Is she pregnant? -No. God, no.
The story is about to break.
-When? -Tonight.
The Mail is splashing it tomorrow. Online, late tonight. Chris Clarke's on his way over.
translation.it: Su The Mail. Online. Chris Clarke sta venendo qui.

translation.en: He's coming here? Now? We have to get ahead of this.
translation.it: - Viene qui? Ora? - Dobbiamo giocare d'anticipo.

translation.en: We have to figure out how to protect our children from it.
translation.it: Dobbiamo capire come proteggere i nostri figli.

translation.en: We have to do both.
[woman] Can't believe I haven't started my Christmas shopping yet.
translation.it: Non ho iniziato lo shopping natalizio.

translation.en: [man] Well, you can buy me a drink and save on gift wrap.
translation.it: Offrimi da bere e risparmia sulla carta.

translation.en: [man 2] Hello!
Called to see if you fancied a drink.
-It sounds like you did. -Join us.
translation.it: - Sembrava di sì. - Unisciti a noi.

translation.en: I'm not in the mood for a crowd.
[man 2] Well, you should be. I heard about the Butler result.
translation.it: Beh, dovresti. Ho saputo di Butler.

translation.en: -The truth won today. -[door closes]
No, no, no. Kate Woodcroft won today.
translation.it: No, oggi ha vinto Kate Woodcroft.

translation.en: Not many lawyers could've pulled that one off.
[man 2] It's the Christmas season. Come and join us.
I hate Christmas.
I would have had you over tonight, but Felicity decided to stay in town.
translation.it: Ti avrei invitata stasera, ma Felicity ha deciso di restare in città.

translation.en: Oh, how unfelicitous.
[man 2] See you soon?
[Kate] Of course.
Have fun.
[Chris] "Top Tory cheats with aide," that's the headline.
translation.it: "Tory di spicco tradisce con l'assistente" è il titolo.

translation.en: I mean, it's not brilliant, but could be worse.
translation.it: Non è bello, ma poteva essere peggio.

translation.en: God knows these knobheads are capable.
translation.it: Dio sa di cosa sono capaci questi idioti.

translation.en: "PM's friend in trysts in the corridors of power." Don't like that.
translation.it: "L'amico del Premier ha una tresca nei corridoi del potere." Peggio.

translation.en: Oh for fuck's sake.
"Britain's most fanciable MP
translation.it: "Il deputato britannico più attraente fa sesso

translation.en: had sex with his female aide in a lift in the Commons."
translation.it: con l'assistente in ascensore alla Camera dei Comuni."

translation.en: Uh, "James Whitehouse, a Home Office minister and confidant of the prime minister,
translation.it: "James Whitehouse, Ministro degli interni e amico del Premier

translation.en: uh, conducted his affair with his parliamentary researcher
translation.it: consuma una relazione con la sua ricercatrice

translation.en: in the Palace of Westminster. The married father of two also shared a room
translation.it: nel Palazzo di Westminster. Il padre di due figli ha diviso la camera

translation.en: with stunning Olivia Lytton, 28, during the party conference."
translation.it: con la splendida Olivia Lytton, 28 anni, durante il congresso del partito."

translation.en: [chuckles] Well, that was fucking stupid. Literally.
[Chris] So she's a classic woman scorned. Is that it? I can't speak for her.
translation.it: - Si sente sedotta e abbandonata? - Non lo so.

translation.en: [Chris] But did you speak to her leading up to this?
translation.it: Ma le hai parlato prima di questo?

translation.en: -Did you know this was coming? -[James] No.
[Chris] "He used her"…
[Chris] Basically, your priority from now on is to rebuild trust all around.
translation.it: In sintesi, adesso la tua priorità è ricostruire la fiducia intorno a te.

translation.en: [James] The party conference is not funded by taxpayers.
translation.it: I contribuenti non finanziano il congresso.

translation.en: [Chris] Think anyone's making distinctions?
Johnny Public bankrolls your salary as a minister in Her Majesty's government.
translation.it: Ti pagano lo stipendio per fare il tuo lavoro di ministro.

translation.en: No one's paying you to bang the help in a House of Commons lift.
translation.it: Non per scopare nell'ascensore della Camera.

translation.en: -[James] She has a brilliant mind. -[Chris] That'd make a better headline.
translation.it: - Ha una mente brillante. - Sarebbe un titolo migliore.

translation.en: "Minister bangs brainy bombshell."
-Alliterative and to the point. -[James] Christ almighty, Chris.
[James] I don't give a fuck about Johnny Public.
[Chris] Johnny Public's gonna be reading this in the Daily Mail.
translation.it: Il pubblico lo leggerà sul Daily Mail.

translation.en: Do you want to have a little chat about it? [James] Johnny Public will support me. I'm sure of it.
translation.it: - Vuoi parlarne? - Il pubblico mi sosterrà, ne sono certo.

translation.en: I expect she'll be dubbed "the ravishing researcher."
You're not gonna be springing any surprises on us?
Such as?
Well, announcing that you're leaving. Putting on your side of the story.
translation.it: Dire che lo lasci. Dare la tua versione della storia.

translation.en: Do you need to ask?
-Of course I do. -Of course she's not leaving.
-Sorry. I didn't mean to-- -[Sophie] Of course I'm not leaving.
translation.it: - Scusa. Non volevo… - Non ti lascio, certo.

translation.en: We've been married for 12 years. We share two children.
translation.it: Siamo sposati da 12 anni. Abbiamo due figli.

translation.en: Why would I throw all that away over a stupid mistake?
translation.it: Dovrei rovinare tutto per uno stupido errore?

translation.en: And there's no need to offer my resignation?
translation.it: E non serve che dia le dimissioni?

translation.en: The PM will make it clear if he wants that, but he doesn't abandon his old friends,
translation.it: No, il Primo Ministro lo dirà se lo vuole, ma non abbandona gli amici,

translation.en: especially not his closest, and you're one of those.
translation.it: specie quelli più cari e tu sei uno di quelli.

translation.en: Says so right here.
Besides, sex doesn't have to kill a career these days.
translation.it: E oggigiorno il sesso non rovina più le carriere.

translation.en: You might even gain some fans amongst the older male voter.
translation.it: Magari conquisti pure qualche elettore maschio più anziano.

translation.en: [chuckles] I mean, they're hardly gonna argue with some touchy-feely,
translation.it: Non avranno obiezioni su qualche effusione

translation.en: some fun on the side with a filly.
She's a woman, not a horse.
translation.it: È una donna, non un cavallo.

translation.en: I'm trying to help your husband.
translation.it: Sto cercando di aiutare tuo marito.

translation.en: And you, for that matter.
translation.it: E te, se è per questo.

translation.en: Well, try not to reveal too much of yourself in the process.
translation.it: Mentre lo fai, non rivelare troppo di te.

translation.en: Someone's coming out punching. That is very good.
translation.it: Si tirano fuori le unghie qui. Molto bene.

translation.en: That is exactly what we need right now.
translation.it: È proprio quello che ci serve.

translation.en: Uh, so listen. No details, but also no denials.
translation.it: Ascolta, niente dettagli, ma niente smentite.

translation.en: Denials have a way of coming back to bite you on the arse.
translation.it: Le smentite ti si ritorcono contro.

translation.en: Therefore, do not elaborate.
The sum of your script is this, deep regret, brief affair,
translation.it: Il copione è questo: gran rammarico, breve relazione, priorità alla famiglia e agli elettori,

translation.en: prioritise your family and constituents,
translation.it: breve relazione, priorità alla famiglia e agli elettori,

translation.en: deflect and dismiss, but never deny. Got it?
translation.it: divaga, fai l'evasivo, ma non negare mai. Chiaro?

translation.en: -Who's there? -[girl] Me.
[James] Em?
-Were you sitting on the stairs? -How long?
translation.it: - Eri seduta sulle scale? - Da quanto?

translation.en: -Not long. -[James] You should be asleep, darling.
I heard voices.
-Hello, Emily. -Remember Mr Clarke?
translation.it: - Ciao, Emily. - Ricordi il sig. Clarke?

translation.en: [Sophie] Let's get you back to bed. Come on.
[smacks lips] What's that Paul Newman quote?
"Why go out for hamburgers when you've got steak at home?"
translation.it: "Non vuoi un hamburger se hai la bistecca."

translation.en: Listen to me, you little prick. This isn't a fucking joke, it's my life.
translation.it: Ascolta, stronzo. Non è uno scherzo, è la mia vita.

translation.en: I love her. Got it?
Oh, mate. I'm only here because the PM told me to be.
translation.it: Amico, sono qui per volontà del Primo Ministro.

translation.en: Quite. So do your fucking job, mate, and help me fix it.
translation.it: Bene. Allora fa' il tuo cazzo di lavoro, amico, e aiutami a rimediare.

translation.en: Is it over?
[whispers] Yes. Yes.
Five months?
It was, as you said, a stupid mistake.
translation.it: È stato, come hai detto tu, uno stupido errore.

translation.en: [Sophie] At the party conference?
Where else?
Work mostly. Usually late at night.
translation.it: Al lavoro, per lo più. Di solito la notte tardi.

translation.en: What, on desks?
In the broom cupboard?
On the right honourable leather sofa?
Did the whole office know?
[James] We were careful.
Apparently not.
Hotel rooms?
[James] A few times.
-[Sophie] How many? -Well, I didn't count.
I would like to have a number in mind.
translation.it: Vorrei avere un numero in mente.

translation.en: -I would find that helpful. -I don't know. 20, 30.
translation.it: - Lo troverei utile. - Non lo so, 20, 30.

translation.en: She doesn't mean anything to me. It was just sex.
translation.it: Non significa niente per me. Era solo sesso.

translation.en: -Nothing's just sex. -But it was, Soph.
translation.it: - Niente è solo sesso. - Ma lo era, Soph.

translation.en: It was.
I've been so stressed out at work these past many months.
translation.it: Sono stato molto stressato al lavoro in questi mesi.

translation.en: I'm honoured to have the immigration portfolio, but it is impossibly complex and literally life and death.
translation.it: Il portafoglio dell'immigrazione è un onore, ma è molto complesso.

translation.en: I haven't even told you a fraction of it.
She… she was just there.
I was weak.
For the life of me, it's a mystery how it even start--
translation.it: Non so neanche come sia iniziata…

translation.en: That's enough.
I'm going to bed.
-Oh my God. I'm sorry. -[Olivia] Sorry, James.
-Minister. -Olivia.
Can I get you a cab?
Yes.
Or you could get me another drink.
translation.it: O potrebbe offrirmi un altro drink.

translation.en: [James] I'll keep this simple.
Before you stands a man who made a mistake.
translation.it: Sono un uomo che ha commesso un errore.

translation.en: [James] My brief affair with a colleague
translation.it: La mia breve relazione con una collega

translation.en: showed disrespect to my marriage,
translation.it: ha mancato di rispetto a mia moglie,

translation.en: to my family, and to the trust of my constituents.
translation.it: alla mia famiglia e alla fiducia dei miei elettori.

translation.en: As I sometimes say to my children,
translation.it: Come a volte dico ai miei figli,

translation.en: under vastly less serious circumstances,
"not okay."
Forgiveness and understanding must be earned,
translation.it: Il perdono e la comprensione vanno guadagnati e non oso chiederli,

translation.en: so I don't presume to ask for those yet, but I do ask for patience
translation.it: Il perdono e la comprensione vanno guadagnati e non oso chiederli, ma chiedo pazienza

translation.en: as I try to repair the damage done to my beloved family
translation.it: mentre cerco di rimediare al danno causato alla mia famiglia

translation.en: and my esteemed constituents.
Thank you all.
That's all for today!
-Hello there. -[Sophie] Hi, Ellie.
[Ellie] Hi. It's nice to see you.
It's nice that it's not last week. [chuckles]
translation.it: E che non sia la settimana scorsa.

translation.en: Apologies for bailing on Mark's birthday. Oh, don't give it another thought.
translation.it: - Scusa per il compleanno di Mark. - Non pensarci.

translation.en: We'll be fine. Of course you will.
translation.it: - Andrà tutto bene. - Certo che sì.

translation.en: Sometimes, I think sex is the root of all evil. [scoffs]
translation.it: Il sesso pare la radice di tutti i mali.

translation.en: That's rubbish. Sex is great.
At least, our sex is great. It's never been a problem for us.
translation.it: Almeno tra noi. Non è mai stato un problema.

translation.en: [inhales deeply] You're lucky.
And a very forgiving person.
Not really.
Like the man said, he made a mistake.
A fling is just that.
[children] Bye!
You're right.
If mere infidelity were enough to ruin a marriage,
there wouldn't be an intact family in this whole bloody school.
translation.it: non ci sarebbero famiglie intatte nella scuola.

translation.en: It's an eyeball. She can see that.
translation.it: - È un bulbo oculare. - Lo vede.

translation.en: -Bye. -[Emily] Can't wait to show Daddy.
-[woman] Prime Minister. -Afternoon.
-[man] Prime Minister. -Afternoon.
-Prime Minister. -[man 2] I believe he's in?
[man] Yes, indeed. I'll--
-[man 2] James. -Tom.
Can we get you anything? Does anyone have chocolate?
translation.it: - Cosa possiamo offrirti? - Avete del cioccolato?

translation.en: Chocolate?
Anything sweet. Just a nibble.
We've got Percy Pigs.
Oh cheers.
Still eating sweets, Mr Creosote? [in French accent] Just a wafer-thin mint.
translation.it: - Mangi ancora dolci, sig. Creosote? - Solo una mentina.

translation.en: Thank you.
[James] Thank you for not hanging me out.
Yet.
-Well, this is the worst of it? -Yes.
translation.it: - Il peggio è già uscito? - Sì.

translation.en: I wish she hadn't been on your payroll.
I wish I had a time machine.
-[Tom] How's Sophie? -Pretty great.
translation.it: - Come sta Sophie? - In forma, direi.

translation.en: Oh, she's always been that.
Forgiving.
I guess she's always been that too.
No. This was the first time in 12 years of marriage, I swear on my life.
translation.it: No. Era la prima volta in 12 anni di matrimonio, giuro.

translation.en: Don't look so serious.
The past is the past as far as I'm concerned.
translation.it: Il passato è passato per me.

translation.en: -Prime Minister, your diary-- -I know. Thank you.
I was planning to introduce the amendment to the immigration bill.
-With your blessing. -Yes. Amend away.
translation.it: Introdurrei l'emendamento alla legge sull'immigrazione. Sì, emenda pure.

translation.en: Now listen. Be good to that wife of yours.
You might think the public are looking to me,
translation.it: Pensi che il pubblico osservi me,

translation.en: but they'll be looking to her.
-Mummy, what's a Libertine? -Beg your pardon?
translation.it: - Mamma, cosa vuol dire libertino? - Come, scusa?

translation.en: It says here Daddy was a Libertine.
translation.it: Qui dice che papà era un "Libertino".

translation.en: -[Sophie] What are you doing with that? -It was in the study.
translation.it: - Dove lo hai preso? - Era nello studio.

translation.en: I told you to stay out of the study. Don't be a snoop.
translation.it: Ti ho detto di non entrarci. Non fare la ficcanaso.

translation.en: -Sorry. What would you like for dinner? -Pizza?
translation.it: - Scusa. Cosa vorresti per cena? - La pizza?

translation.en: Pizza?
[Sophie] Good idea. Let's do it.
translation.it: Ottima idea. Vada per la pizza.

translation.en: -But, Mummy, what is a Libertine? -[Sophie] Mmhmm?
Um, it was a club that Daddy was in at Oxford with Uncle Tom.
translation.it: Era un club di Oxford in cui erano papà e lo zio Tom.

translation.en: But what does the word mean?
translation.it: Ma che vuol dire la parola?

translation.en: It means someone who likes to have a good time. Would you like a pepperoni or plain cheese?
translation.it: Qualcuno a cui piace divertirsi. Salame piccante o formaggio?

translation.en: -Plain cheese, please. -[Sophie] Okay. I'll call when it's ready.
translation.it: - Formaggio. - Ok. Ti chiamo quando è pronta.

translation.en: Wasn't she helping you with homework? We finished.
translation.it: - Non ti aiutava coi compiti? - Abbiamo finito.

translation.en: I'm a Libertine.
No. You're not.
Why not?
Ask Daddy about it. Go, go. I'll call you when it's pizza.
translation.it: Chiedi a papà. Vai. Ti chiamo per la pizza.

translation.en: [Krystyna] Emily?
[man] Let's go! Libertines!
[man 2] Go, Libertines!
[woman] Sophie!
Fuck's sake.
Please tell me that puddle I stepped in was cider and not fresher piss.
translation.it: Dimmi che ho calpestato sidro e non piscio fresco.

translation.en: More likely to be second or third-year piss.
translation.it: Credo piscio del secondo o terzo anno.

translation.en: [woman] To making it through our first week.
translation.it: Per aver superato la prima settimana.

translation.en: [Sophie] To escaping Mom and Dad.
translation.it: Per aver lasciato mamma e papà.

translation.en: -[woman] Sorry. -Sorry, sorry.
[woman 2] She lives outside of the library!
-Very funny, Alison. -Oh, I didn't think you'd show.
translation.it: - Divertente, Alison. - Non pensavo di vederti.

translation.en: -You told me not to be such a spod. -And are you? A spod?
translation.it: - Mi avevi detto di non fare la secchiona. - Lo sei? Una secchiona?

translation.en: -Yes. -Oh, Holly Berry, Sophie Greenaway.
Holly Berry? I was conceived on Christmas Eve.
translation.it: - Holly Berry? - Mi hanno concepita la vigilia di Natale.

translation.en: -Christ. -Yeah. That was the other possibility.
[boys] Chug! Chug! Chug!
-What are they doing? -They're anal chugging.
Anal what? It's a drinking game the rugby boys like to play.
translation.it: - Cosa? - Un gioco alcolico dei ragazzi del rugby.

translation.en: [Alison] Some of the club boys too. I spot a trio of Libertines over there.
translation.it: Anche dei ragazzi del club. Vedo un trio di Libertini laggiù.

translation.en: …and, while I will go to my grave
translation.it: …e anche se andrò nella tomba rispettando l'opinione

translation.en: respecting the opinion of the honourable member from Morewood and Barnsford,
translation.it: …e anche se andrò nella tomba rispettando l'opinione della deputata di Morewood e Barnsford,

translation.en: I must dispute her objections to this amendment.
translation.it: devo contestare le sue obiezioni a questo emendamento.

translation.en: The honourable lady is concerned about fairness.
translation.it: L'onorevole signora ha a cuore l'equità.

translation.en: This proposed change to the immigration bill
translation.it: La proposta di modifica alla legge sull'immigrazione garantisce

translation.en: represents the most equitable approach to both skilled and low-skilled workers
translation.it: La proposta di modifica alla legge sull'immigrazione garantisce l'approccio più equo per i lavoratori più e meno qualificati

translation.en: of any legislation in the past 50 years!
translation.it: di qualsiasi altra legge degli ultimi 50 anni.

translation.en: -It is more inclusive, not less! -[indistinct clamoring]
Esteemed colleagues,
if I have learned anything in my 44 years on this Earth, it is this.
translation.it: se ho imparato qualcosa nei miei 44 anni su questa Terra, è questo.

translation.en: If it looks like a duck, walks like a duck, and quacks like a duck,
translation.it: Se sembra un'anatra, cammina come tale e fa qua qua,

translation.en: vote aye for that duck.
And what about a duck caught having an affair with a duckling in his employ?
translation.it: E se l'anatra ha una relazione con un anatroccolo che lavora per lei?

translation.en: What does the honourable gentleman think such a duck should do?
translation.it: Cosa dovrebbe fare l'anatra, onorevole signore?

translation.en: -[man 2] Yeah. -[man 3] Yes.
Swim.
[woman] Order! Order!
So he acquitted himself well?
Oh, you mean other than having an affair with a subordinate half his age
translation.it: A parte scoparsi una sottoposta con la metà dei suoi anni

translation.en: and fucking her in a Westminster lift before elevenses?
I mean today, in the House. And she's not half his age.
translation.it: Intendo oggi, alla Camera. E non è così giovane.

translation.en: -Looks it. -Plus, he's popular.
You're the one who told me he's number two on sexymp.co.uk, or whatever it is.
translation.it: Mi hai detto tu che è il numero due su sexymp.co.uk.

translation.en: He's moved to number one.
Well, that's surely a first for a member of the Conservative Party.
translation.it: Il primo di un partito conservatore.

translation.en: Besides which, he's the most naturally gifted politician on our side of the Chamber.
translation.it: Inoltre, è il politico più abile nella nostra parte della Camera.

translation.en: [Chris] Still, if he gets full on MeToo'd,
it could start to make your loyalty look ill-advised.
It would make the public wonder what it's based on, Prime Minister.
translation.it: La gente si chiederà il perché, Primo Ministro.

translation.en: History. Nothing more complicated.
translation.it: La storia. Niente di più complicato.

translation.en: James Whitehouse's famous shepherd's pie.
translation.it: Il famoso shepherd's pie di James Whitehouse.

translation.en: -Isn't that Granny's recipe? -[James] Only better.
translation.it: - Non è la ricetta di nonna? - Migliorata.

translation.en: This is version 2.0. We haven't had this in ages.
translation.it: - È la versione 2.0. - Non la facevi da tanto.

translation.en: I make it all the time.
Really? Is that why you had Tuppence walk you through the recipe on three occasions?
translation.it: Davvero? Perciò hai chiesto la ricetta a Tuppence tre volte?

translation.en: I suppose it has been quite a while.
translation.it: Immagino sia passato un po' di tempo.

translation.en: [James] Krystyna.
It's yummy, Daddy.
-Good. -Napkins.
[Krystyna] Mmm. Yes, James. Really good.
[boy] So yummy.
-Would you like some wine? -Please.
-Krystyna, would you some? -No. Thank you.
I'd like to propose a toast.
-[Emily] To what? -To Mummy.
No. Why?
'Cause she's the most wonderful woman I know.
translation.it: Perché è la migliore al mondo.

translation.en: -To Mummy. -[all] To Mummy.
-[Sophie] Sorry. -No.
-[coughs, laughs] -[Olivia] So I read your draft proposal.
I think it's cracking.
[James] Too bad. The hardliners are telling me it's too humane.
translation.it: Peccato. Per i più intransigenti, è buonista.

translation.en: What do you think? Can I have some more?
[laughs] Oh God, sorry. I'm sorry.
-[James laughing] -Oh, now it's empty.
[James] Well, that explains how you managed to take advantage of me.
translation.it: Questo spiega come ti sei approfittata di me.

translation.en: [Olivia] Oh yes. Sorry about that.
[woman] Where are you?
[Kate] At the office.
[woman] At this hour on a Friday?
That's bonkers. Come round for a drink.
translation.it: Pura follia. Vieni a bere qualcosa.

translation.en: I'd love to, but I got pulled into something.
translation.it: Vorrei, ma devo studiare una cosa.

translation.en: [woman] Oh, it's the holiday season.
For fuck's sake, live a little, Woodcroft.
I'm already sipping a Scotch, you'll be happy to hear.
translation.it: Sto bevendo scotch, se ti fa felice.

translation.en: [woman] Good. Well, you can chase it with some fizz.
translation.it: Bene. Potresti continuare con delle bollicine.

translation.en: A kid in my class's parents knew just what I asked Father Christmas for.
translation.it: I genitori di un bimbo in classe sapevano cosa volevo da Babbo Natale.

translation.en: -[Kate] Where are Ed and your kids? -He took them to a movie.
translation.it: - Dove sono Ed e i tuoi figli? - Al cinema.

translation.en: So I've, more or less, one more hour of peace, quiet, and laundry.
translation.it: Quindi ho più o meno un'altra ora di pace, silenzio e bucato.

translation.en: Come on. Please?
We can get pleasantly pissed while you watch me fold.
translation.it: Potremmo ubriacarci mentre piego il bucato.

translation.en: Look, I'll just be distracted until I finish with these papers.
translation.it: Sarò distratta se non finisco questi documenti.

translation.en: What is it?
The usual… [sighs] …but quite high-profile.
translation.it: Il solito. Ma di alto profilo.

translation.en: I'm not sure I should take this one.
Of course you should.
Look, I really shouldn't discuss it.
Oh don't be ridiculous. You can certainly tell me.
translation.it: Non essere ridicola. A me puoi dirlo.

translation.en: Love you.
[Sophie] Thanks, Kenneth. See you in a bit.
Yes.
[woman whispering] Is that Mrs Whitehouse?
Isn't that James Whitehouse's wife?
translation.it: Non è la moglie di James Whitehouse?

translation.en: -Sophie. -Mrs Whitehouse.
[man] Can you give us a comment about your husband's affair?
Mrs Whitehouse.
[man] Sophie!
[Olivia] James.
-Hi, it's Whitehouse. -[whispers] Hi.
-Can I take your coat? -Thanks.
-Really? -[James] I know.
Hello.
-Hello. -Hello, darling.
-You remember Lawrence Hughes-Davies? -Of course.
-[Sophie] How are you? -Very good.
-[Sophie] Good. Yeah. -Listen, I was just saying to James.
translation.it: - Bene. - Lo stavo dicendo a James.

translation.en: I've witnessed every kind of weather in the three and a half decades I've been here.
translation.it: Ho visto ogni tipo di clima in questi tre decenni e mezzo qui.

translation.en: This doesn't qualify as a squall. Not even a disturbance.
translation.it: Questa non è una burrasca. Neanche una perturbazione.

translation.en: Just a bit of rain, dear. And look… [chuckles] …it's passed.
translation.it: Solo un po' di pioggia, cara. E, guarda, è già cessata.

translation.en: Now, boys will be boys, but I'm sure this one has learned his lesson.
translation.it: Gli uomini sono fatti così, ma ha imparato la lezione.

translation.en: My wife always said, "Once, okay. Twice, go away."
translation.it: Mia moglie diceva: "Una si sopporta, due prendi la porta".

translation.en: I left it at once. Enjoy your tea. Hmm?
translation.it: Io mi sono limitato a una. Godetevi il pranzo.

translation.en: I'm sorry about that. [chuckles]
You know, I thought I was, um, fine coming here,
translation.it: Pensavo di riuscire a venire qui,

translation.en: but it's bringing it all back.
The affair?
No. My fear.
[James] About what?
I thought we were clear all those years ago.
translation.it: Pensavo che fossimo stati chiari anni fa.

translation.en: I am not my mother.
I will not live my mother's life.
translation.it: Non vivrò la vita di mia madre.

translation.en: I will not be the long-suffering spouse.
translation.it: Non sarò la moglie che soffre sempre.

translation.en: "Once, okay. Twice, go away." Fuck off.
translation.it: "Una si sopporta, due prendi la porta." Fanculo.

translation.en: I'm not interested.
And I can't do it, James.
Especially in the fishbowl of politics.
I always thought that our marriage was, um…
translation.it: Ho sempre pensato che il nostro matrimonio fosse…

translation.en: …superior. [scoffs]
Was that the lift?
[James] What do you mean?
The one that I just came up in.
Was that one of the sites of your affair? The one that made the headlines?
translation.it: Era uno dei luoghi della tua relazione? Quello che ha fatto notizia?

translation.en: Jesus.
[James] I'm so sorry.
I should have found another…
It was thoughtless.
Soph, as awful as this week has been, and everything I put you through,
translation.it: Soph, nonostante la terribile settimana e tutto quello che ti ho fatto passare,

translation.en: I am grateful for one thing.
The certainty that you are the person I want to die with.
translation.it: La certezza che tu sia la persona con cui voglio morire.

translation.en: Would die for.
Making this right with you is all I care about.
translation.it: Sistemare le cose con te è la mia unica preoccupazione.

translation.en: [James] You and the kids.
If you tell me to…
I will give up all this.
I swear.
I will stand up right now and tell this room full of MPs that I resign.
translation.it: Mi alzo e dico a tutti questi parlamentari che mi dimetto.

translation.en: Right now.
If that's what you want.
If the future doesn't include you, Sophie Whitehouse,
translation.it: Se il futuro non include te, Sophie Whitehouse,

translation.en: the future is shite.
[James] You sure you don't want Kenneth to take you back?
You'll get home earlier this way.
Come on, James!
[Sophie] Come on, James!
Bloody hell, they're fast.
They're unstoppable.
If only he were a bit dim, it might seem fair.
translation.it: Se fosse un po' ottuso, sarebbe più giusto.

translation.en: But no, your boyfriend got dealt all the best cards, including a spot as an Oxford Blue.
translation.it: Ma no, il tuo ragazzo ha avuto tutto, incluso il distintivo Blu di Oxford.

translation.en: Adonis.
[Sophie] What?
It comes from the Canaanite word for "lord."
He's the god of beauty and desire.
translation.it: Dio della bellezza e del desiderio.

translation.en: Holly, James Whitehouse is taken.
I'm going to marry that boy one day.
You gonna tell him you're gonna marry him?
He knows.
He just doesn't know that he knows. [chuckles]
translation.it: Solo che non sa di saperlo.

translation.en: Yes, mate.
[man] Oh, James. Nice to see Sophie here.
translation.it: James. È bello vedere Sophie qui.

translation.en: [James] Thank you.
-Mr Whitehouse. -[James] Yes?
Detective Sergeant Willis. This is my colleague, Detective Constable Rydon.
translation.it: Sergente detective Murphy. La mia collega, detective Rydon.

translation.en: We've been trying to contact you. But your office seemed to have lost track of you.
translation.it: - L'abbiamo cercata. - Al suo ufficio non la trovavano.

translation.en: Well, I switched my mobile off while I had tea with my wife.
translation.it: Pranzavo con mia moglie. Ho spento il telefono.

translation.en: Criminal behaviour, I know. [chuckles]
translation.it: Un crimine, mi rendo conto. Di cosa si tratta?

translation.en: -May I ask what this is about? -Olivia Lytton.
translation.it: Un crimine, mi rendo conto. Di cosa si tratta? Olivia Lytton.

translation.en: What about her?
We'd like to ask you a few questions in connection with an allegation.
translation.it: Vorremmo farle qualche domanda in merito a una denuncia.

translation.en: An allegation of what? Rape, sir.
An allegation of rape.
♪ How the mighty fall ♪
